sen.j: 湯泉地温泉（とうせんじおんせん）は、奈良県吉野郡十津川村（旧国大和国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Tosenji Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring in Totsukawa-mura village, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture (the former Yamato Province).
Tosenji Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring in Totsukawa-mura village, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture (the former Yamato Province).
Tosenji Onsen Hot Spring is a hot spring in Totsukawa-mura village, Yoshino-gun, Nara Prefecture (the former Yamato Province).

sen.j: 車 五條市・新宮市から国道168号
sen.e: By car Take National route 168 from Gojo City or Singu City
By car: Take National route 168 from Gojo City or Singu City
sen.cmt: By carの後ろにコロンを追加
sen.e: By car: Take National route 168 from Gojo City or Singu City

sen.j: バス 近畿日本鉄道大和八木駅、西日本旅客鉄道五条駅 (奈良県)、JR新宮駅より奈良交通（八木新宮線、十津川線） - 「十津川村役場前」停留所
sen.e: By bus Take Nara Kotsu Bus Lines (Yagi-Shingu Route, Totsukawa Route) from Yamato-Yagi Station of Kinki Nippon Railway Company, Gojo Station of West Japan Railway Company, or JR Singu Station, and get off the bus at the bus stop, `Totsukawa-mura Office.'

By bus: Take Nara Kotsu Bus Lines (Yagi-Shingu Route, Totsukawa Route) from Yamato-Yagi Station of the Kinki Nippon Railway Company, Gojo Station of the West Japan Railway Company, or JR Singu Station, and get off the bus at the bus stop, `Totsukawa-mura Office.'
sen.cmt: By busの後ろにコロンを追加、鉄道会社に定冠詞を付与
sen.e: By bus: Take Nara Kotsu Bus Lines (Yagi-Shingu Route, Totsukawa Route) from Yamato-Yagi Station of the Kinki Nippon Railway Company, Gojo Station of the West Japan Railway Company, or JR Singu Station, and get off the bus at the bus stop, `Totsukawa-mura Office.'
Sulfur spring
Sulfur spring
Sulfur spring

sen.j: 十津川村役場近辺に5軒の旅館、2軒の民宿が存在する。
sen.e: There are five Japanese Inns and two Minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board) in the vicinity of Totsukawa-mura Office
There are five Japanese Inns and two Minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board) in the vicinity of Totsukawa-mura Office
There are five Japanese Inns and two Minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board) in the vicinity of Totsukawa-mura Office

sen.j: 共同浴場は2軒存在する。
sen.e: There are two communal bathes.
There are two communal baths.
There are two communal baths.
They are Izumiyu and Takinoyu.
They are Izumiyu and Takinoyu.
They are Izumiyu and Takinoyu.

sen.j: いずれも露天風呂と内湯を備えている。
sen.e: Both of them are equipped with an open spa and a indoor hot spring.
Both of them are equipped with an open spa and a indoor hot spring.
Both of them are equipped with an open spa and a indoor hot spring.
It was opened 550 years ago.
It was opened 550 years ago.
It was opened 550 years ago.

sen.j: 佐久間信盛が最期にこの地で過ごした。
sen.e: Nobumori SAKUMA spent his last time here.
Nobumori SAKUMA spent his last time here.
Nobumori SAKUMA spent his last time here.
His grave still remains.
His grave still remains.
His grave still remains.

sen.j: 1985年3月19日、十津川温泉、上湯温泉とともに国民保養温泉地に指定。
sen.e: On March 19, 1985, it was designated as a People's Recreation Spa along with Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring and Kamiyu Onsen Hot Spring.
On March 19, 1985, it was designated as a People's Recreation Spa along with Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring and Kamiyu Onsen Hot Spring.
On March 19, 1985, it was designated as a People's Recreation Spa along with Totsukawa Onsen Hot Spring and Kamiyu Onsen Hot Spring.

sen.j: 2004年6月28日、十津川村役場が、村内の温泉の「100%源泉掛け流し宣言」を発表した。
sen.e: On June 28, 2004, Totsukawa-mura village office declared that hot springs within Totsukawa-mura village are` 100% free-flowing hot-spring.'
On June 28, 2004, Totsukawa-mura village office declared that hot springs within Totsukawa-mura village are` 100% free-flowing hot-spring.'
